data.title: Front-end developer
data.responsibilities: I enjoyed the team lead experience but went back to calling myself a front-end developer... I still coach IT-teams. I mainly develop web applications in React, but also hybride mobile apps in React Native and Flutter. The 'VanheedePlus' app is one of the projects I co-created. I like speaking in front of an audience which is why I give presentations at meetups and schools. My current work involves micro frontend architecture, design systems & component libraries. I use Storybook to visualise and document the component libraries.

data.title: Stack Architect & Team Lead
data.responsibilities: I helped to create Meditech products together with a team of 4 developers. I introduced the Agile mindset in the team. A couple of months before taking on a new adventure, I had redrawn the entire stack towards a service-based architecture. The architecture was loosely coupled and had the ability to serve data 40 times faster and was 200 times more resilient (without scaling, in comparison to the previous monolithic architecture).

data.title: Full stack lead webdeveloper
data.responsibilities: Made around 150-200 websites and e-commerce webshops using Concrete5 and Magento. The traffic generated to those websites ranged from 100 views/month to more than 25000 views/month. I guided one other developer & also coached the clients in the Concrete5 CMS. The servers ran on Linux, which I updated and maintained.

data.title: PL/SQL & Java trainee
data.responsibilities: A unified single sign-on for all ADMB products. After a while working in Java, I leaned back towards other technologies.

data.title: Software engineer
data.responsibilities: The on-screen manual of televisions for 1 year & build PHP-driven web applications for internal use.

data.title: Drupal webdeveloper
data.responsibilities: Biggest project was a multi-site system for a political party. This multisite system accumulated to around 300 websites and more than 150000 views/month for the main 'national' website. I did theming, configuration, custom module coding & slicing of design.
